item.title: KO
item.description: score:97 Chances: The brand is optimistic that the sports drink will win over health-conscious consumers and fill a key void in its portfolio. Coke (KO) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.
